com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.impl.local.paginated.atomicoperations

Class OAtomicOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.impl.local.paginated.atomicoperations.OAtomicOperation

  • public class OAtomicOperation
extends Object
    Note: all atomic operations methods are designed in context that all operations on single files will be wrapped in shared lock.
    Since:
    12/3/13
    Author:
    Andrey Lomakin (a.lomakin-at-orientechnologies.com)

      • addMetadata

        public void addMetadata(OAtomicOperationMetadata<?> metadata)
        Add metadata with given key inside of atomic operation. If metadata with the same key insist inside of atomic operation it will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        metadata - Metadata to add.
        See Also:
        OAtomicOperationMetadata

      • getMetadata

        public OAtomicOperationMetadata<?> getMetadata(String key)
        Parameters:
        key - Key of metadata which is looking for.
        Returns:
        Metadata by associated key or null if such metadata is absent.

      • getMetadata

        public Map<String,OAtomicOperationMetadata<?>> getMetadata()
        Returns:
        All keys and associated metadata contained inside of atomic operation
